attributes.action: Bring back the death sentence for murders paedophiles and child murders
attributes.background: Hundreds of thousands of innocent people and children are being murdered and abused by Paedophile rings all over the country, all our prisons are full & In this day of age we are able to convict these criminals by DNA this is 100% positive and proves against all odds that these criminals are guilty

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108273

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
